headline.main: German Union Calls for Strikes in Steel Sector Over Pay Dispute
headline.print_headline: German Union Calls for Strikes in Steel Sector Over Pay Dispute

lead_paragraph: A pay dispute in Germany's steel sector intensified on Monday as the IG Metall union rejected an offer for a wage increase of 1.3 percent and called for labour strikes in northwest Germany on Tuesday.
snippet: A pay dispute in Germany's steel sector intensified on Monday as the IG Metall union rejected an offer for a wage increase of 1.3 percent and called for labour strikes in northwest Germany on Tuesday....
